text: Vera-Ellen (February 16, 1921 â€“ August 30, 1981) was an American actress and dancer. She danced with Fred Astaire, Danny Kaye, Gene Kelly and several others. She played Princess Maria in the movie Call Me Madam. She also played Judy Haynes in the movie White Christmas. She was born in Norwood, Ohio, a suburb of Cincinnati. She died from cancer at age sixty. ==References== Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:1921 births Category:1981 deaths
title: Vera-Ellen
